attributes.action: Intervene in the Prices set for car insurance for Young Drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Insurance companies in general charge a lot for car insurance especially for male drivers. Taking into consideration that more male drivers claim than female drivers and it's "Boy Racers" that effect it for every male driver, there should not be a £1000 plus difference between male and female policies. 

It appears that the majority of insurance companies take advantage of Young Drivers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
